thread.title: Mindseeker Names Andy Zeweri as Company's New CFO

author: cnbc.com
title: Mindseeker Names Andy Zeweri as Company's New CFO
text:
ASHBURN, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Mindseeker, Inc., a national professional services and consulting firm, announced today that it has named Andy Zeweri as the company’s new CFO.
Andy will be responsible for developing and executing Mindseeker’s corporate strategic plan and helping fund, build and scale its various lines of business. He will also work to secure capital, identify and implement system and processes to maximize internal efficiencies and assist in business development. Andy will be leading the accounting and finance department and will be collaborating with executive team members working on strategy, banking relationships, credit management, outside investments and acquisitions.
Chris Dobson, President of Mindseeker said, “We are extremely excited to have Andy join the Mindseeker team. Andy is a very strategic and futuristic thinker and has the leadership skills and experience needed to help get us to the next level of our journey.”
Andy joins Mindseeker with an extensive background in both accounting and finance that spans his entire career demonstrating a history of working in the information technology and services industry with an in-depth knowledge of accounting, budgeting, auditing, DCAA, GAAP and FAR compliance rules and regulations.
“Great Milestones in business are never achieved by one person. They are done by a team of people and I am thrilled to be joining Mindseeker’s dynamic and fast growing leadership team where the keystone of successful growth is cooperation,” said Zeweri.
Along with his accounting and finance experience, Andy has Information System technology experience and has participated in bringing in scalable efficiencies to commercial companies as well as local county governments by using the power of technology to redesign processes and streamline operations resulting in increased revenue and decrease overhead expenses.
About Mindseeker, Inc.
Mindseeker is a certified Women-Owned Small Business (WOSB) and provides Information Technology, Health Information Management and Financial services to public and private sector organizations. Since its founding in 2000, Mindseeker’s client list has included federal, state, and local government agencies, Fortune 500 companies, academic medical centers, health systems, and physician groups nationwide. Mindseeker’s healthcare division delivers HIM and revenue cycle services that include outsourced medical coding, reimbursement and compliance auditing, clinical documentation improvement (CDI), case management and interim management. Additional information may be found at www.mindseeker.com .
